changeSet.author: ntodorovic
changeSet.sql: create sequence campaign_document_seq; create type ecampaigndocumentaccesslevel as enum ('PLATFORM_ADMINS', 'INVESTORS', 'PUBLIC'); create type ecampaigndocumenttype as enum ('DOCTYPE1', 'DOCTYPE2', 'DOCTYPE3'); create table if not exists campaign_document ( id bigint not null constraint campaign_document_pkey primary key, access_level ecampaigndocumentaccesslevel, title varchar(255), type ecampaigndocumenttype, upload_date timestamp, url varchar(255), campaign_id bigint constraint campaign_document_fk_on_campaign references campaign );
